sourcesContent:
<template>
<v-text-field class="d-flex justify-start mr-6"
  placeholder="Add duration in seconds"
  solo
  dense
></v-text-field>
</template>


<script>
export default {
  props: ["readonly", "emitter", "ikey", "getData", "putData"],
  data() {
    return {
      value: 0
    };
  },
  methods: {
    change(e) {
      this.value = e.target.value;
      this.update();
    },
    update() {
      if (this.ikey) this.putData(this.ikey, this.value);
      this.emitter.trigger("process");
    }
  },
  mounted() {
    this.value = this.getData(this.ikey);
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>
select, input {
  width: 100%;
  border-radius: 30px;
  background-color: white;
  padding: 2px 6px;
  border: 1px solid #999;
  font-size: 110%;
  width: 170px;
}
</style>
